name: Fire scene
description:
-Fanatics in the middle of the night of arson were rampant within the city, not enough fire, even in the city placed a high risk of explosives! Players can manipulate water droplets put out the fire?
-Gameplay is very simple, just in time to control and guide the falling water droplets into the fire.Extinguish the fire needs 5 drops.
-The game is quite innovative. It fits like brains, do not ike "Angry Birds" too much luck as the player.
-Support Retina screen.
-32 Levels include.
-Enjoy it !
